item.title: TOST
item.description: score:-8 Chances: High growth and low risk are a compelling combination. The past few years have been a non-stop thrill ride for Toast (NYSE: TOST) investors. You wouldn’t know it by looking at the stock price, but the business has continued to thrive, expanding its customer base, increasing sales, and paring its losses.
